title: Apple actively planning to expand supply chain locations after lockdown strains reliance on China
content:
With constant lockdowns in China due to the rise of COVID-19 cases, Apple is now in ”action plan” to diversify its supply chain management risks out of the country, according to a new report by analyst Ming-Chi Kuo.

more…

The post Apple actively planning to expand supply chain locations after lockdown strains reliance on China appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: With constant lockdowns in China due to the rise of COVID cases, Apple is now in ”action plan” to diversify its supply chain management risks
